rooms.description: Multi-functional space for living and dining, with a minimalistic decor to adhere to budget constraints.
Compact kitchen area equipped with essential appliances; designed in accordance with Vastu principles by placing it on the south-east corner.
Main bedroom with minimalistic design and storage facilities; located towards north-west per Vastu to promote positive energy.
Functional bathroom adjacent to the bedroom for ease of access, designed with water-saving fixtures.
Open studio space that doubles as a work area or guest room, integrated into the ground floor design.

special_features.description: Compact pool designed for relaxation and occasional recreation; integrated within the irregular plot layout while adhering to local building norms.
